name: GREEN FARMS CO, LLC
description: Partners with hemp farmers, and manufactures, dist., and develops plant-based products.
sampleDescriptions: To advance policy and legislation to resolve the regulatory uncertainty for hemp-containing products, to include hemp-derived cannabidiol (CBD).
